attributes.action: A law for all dogs to be kept on a lead in public areas to prevent dog attacks
attributes.additional_details: To bring in a new law regarding dogs . All dogs should be on a lead out in public to prevent dogs from being attacked by other dogs .
attributes.background: A new law for all dogs to be kept on a lead in public areas to prevent dogs from being attacked by another dog .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Require all dogs to be on a lead when on public pavements
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644312
